title: [经济]QuickShop快捷商店 —— 95%汉化真正意义上的汉化[1.5.2-1.7.2]
author: kanlo012
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 10:01 编辑 

  {:10_492:}大家好在下 新风树  当初打算用来开自己的服务器的,由于时间和服务器原因不能开了所以特地放出本人汉化的一个插件
这个商店本人觉得很人性化简单  推荐服务器都能用上这个插件

这个插件作者目前只更新到 1.52的  但1.62和1.64是完美能用的 你放心好了.
本人第一次发作品 求能给个精品 ..目前我还没在论坛看过商店插件 全部汉化的..很多服务器上面商店都是英文看着很不习惯  ..希望大家都能推广这个插件

   这个插件汉化是需要修改程序代码的,所以要反编译在编译回来!(很多没有汉化到物品就是个原因)
   真心希望水桶官方能把 物品名称 做国际化 (因为作者引用的是水桶API里面的枚举变量名)

    有BUG请回复 或 发到我邮箱 l.bin.xw@gmail.com
    对了还有这个插件的使用方法

  出售物品:
  
    拿着要卖的物品  左键点击箱子  会提示你输入价格  就OK了,对了要记得把你卖的东西放入箱子里.
    东西卖完会提示卖完信息给你的. 很简单吧啊
  
     购买物品:
  
      左建点击箱子  会提示信息名称 然后 输入购买数量就 OK了
  
     权限和命令差不多是这些了  ,英文不是很好 也懒的翻译了 自己翻译下应该可以看的懂的 
  

Commands/qs unlimited - Makes the shop you're looking at become unlimited./qs setowner <player> - Changes shop owner to <player>./qs buy - Changes your shop you're looking at to one that buys items/qs sell - Changes your shop you're looking at to one that sells items/qs price <price> - Change the price of your shop that you're looking at/qs clean - Removes any existing shop that has 0 stock./qs find <item> - Use to find the nearest shop that begins with <item> - E.g. '/qs find dia' will find the nearest diamond shop./shop - Alias (Optional) of /qs
Player Nodesquickshop.use - Required to use ANY quickshopquickshop.create.sell - Required to make a QuickShop (At all)quickshop.create.buy - Required to use /qs buy (Change the shop type from Sell -> Buy)quickshop.create.double - Required to make doublechest shops.quickshop.create.changeprice - Required to use /qs price (Ability to change the price of a shop without destroying it. This may allow for some scammers to quickly change the price while someone is buying.quickshop.bypass.ItemID - Required to sell blacklisted items (E.g. bedrock)quickshop.find - Required to use /qs find <item>
Admin Nodesquickshop.unlimited - Required to use /quickshop unlimitedquickshop.setowner - Allows use of /qs setownerquickshop.other.destroy - Allow breaking other peoples QuickShops if they're locked by this pluginquickshop.other.open - Allow opening (And stealing/Stocking) other players QuickShopsquickshop.other.price - Allow changing price of other people's shopsquickshop.refill - Ability to refill chests using a command (=Unlimited items)quickshop.empty - Ability to empty chests of all itemsquickshop.clean - Permission to purge any shops that have 0 stock.
